extendedInfo.description: *********************************************************                                                               *****" FIX " option will be added at next update.  *****                                                               **********************************************************Dead Pixel Test Pro is a useful and simple test app to find dead pixels of your screen. With this handy app you can check your screen (display or LED) with 9 different color. Every unique color gives you chance to find dead or malfunction pixels when you buy a new smart phone. Dead Pixel Test Pro is completely a free app. Also you can use its bright full color screen as a flashlight, flash lamp.Fix functions will be added on next update!!!FEATURES : + Test Your Screen Easily + 9 Different Bright Colors + Swipe to Change Color + Full Brightness + FlashlightDCB Software Solutions.Key Words : dead, pixel , test , pro , screen , screen test , pixel test , dead pixel test , brightness , color, colour ,tools , best app , best , adfree, display , led, flashlight, flash lamp

reviews.title: perfect
reviews.comment: ease to use , simplicity , works perfect.
